title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: December 19, 2022, 07:27:49 PMLast edit: December 20, 2022, 02:20:30 PM by Kryptowerk
content: - - -   2 x   M O N E R O   0 .  2 5   X M R   C A R D   - - -More info on the cards: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5140464.0   Each card is loaded with 0.25 XMR, privet-key handling and security hologram by Moonbits.All cards will be shipped bend- and water-protected.Lot 1: XMR card #113Lot 2: XMR card #117STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.003 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002 BTCEND TIME: Friday DECEMBER 30th, 2022, 17:00:00 EST (New York Time)TIMER: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/winter?iso=20221230T23&p0=37&msg=2x+XMR+cards+&font=serif&csz=1- Payment due within 48 hours of auction end -SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin or MoneroSHIPPING: ranges from 6 - 20€ depending on location and tracking option.NEW ACCOUNTS: newly created accounts (without positive trust for successful trades and without copper membership) are only allowed to bid if they sent a pm to me first and are willing to deposit a collateral (0.005 BTC) either directly to me or to a trusted escrow on this forum (MJ, Hhampuz, krogoth, Mopar etc.).I also reserve the right to exclude anyone from bidding if they got a bunch of negative trust.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.created_time: December 21, 2022, 10:49:00 PMLast edit: December 23, 2022, 12:16:04 PM by Kryptowerk
comments.body: Thanks for kicking this auction off, Yoda & Mr Mojo!Current high bidsLot 1: .003 MrMojoRising26Lot 2: .003 YodasRedRocketPS: I updated the OP from "All cards will be shipped bend- and water-proof." to "All cards will be shipped bend- and water-protected."- Gotta stay realistic.  But unless there is serious serious mistreatment from the postal-service they will arrive unharmed.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Current high bidsLot 1: .0034 MrMojoRising26Lot 2: .0032  Jambo USA Ends in little less than 3 days.Note: Make sure to refresh the timer from time to time, otherwise it might be off.
